basics.name: Maya Chang
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

education.institution: University of Technology Sydney, Sydney, NSW, Australia

work.summary: Student English mentor for international students attending UH Manoa
highlights: Communicated with international students to bridge language barriers
Engaged in cultural exchange with international students
Assisted other team members to achieve goals
Took orders, prepared meals and collected payments
Maintained fast speed of service, especially during rush times
Worked with other team members to create easy to understand website development curriculum
Taught the fundamentals of Javascript, CSS and HTML to highschool students

volunteer.summary: Member of student group working to prevent climate change
highlights: Communicated with team members and outside organizations to organize events
Utilized social media to advertise events to a wide audience

awards.title: Provost Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshman students who are residents of Hawai'i with a minimum overall GPA of 3.8 (4.0 scale). Evidence of superior academic achievement or creative endeavor and record of academic, co-curricular, and community service activities.
